docs.snippet: Without the stalwarts that helped Atlanta to 14 straight division championships, the team has started to flounder and struggle to score runs this season....
docs.lead_paragraph: Without the stalwarts that helped Atlanta to 14 straight division championships, the team has started to flounder and struggle to score runs this season.
docs.abstract: Atlanta Braves are stocked with talent but are floundering with a young lineup; they seem to desperately need one of those stalwarts from a previous era to walk through the doors of their clubhouse ready to slip on a jersey.

headline.main: Sliding Braves Look to Their Past
